name: Tran Thao Khuyen, ACCA
about:
• Experience in accounting treatment, SAP in advantageous.
• Experience in preparing and controlling budget/forecast, cashflow, analyzing financial results, and providing meaningful variance analysis to support business decisions as well as suggestions for areas of improvement.
• Expert in standardizing Finance & SOP.
• Work well individually as well as with subordinate, immediate supervisor and colleagues at all level in challenging, high-pressure, and deadline-oriented environments.

experiences.institution_name: Ascendas Saigon Bund Company Limited (OneHub Saigon Project)
experiences.description:
OneHub Saigon is a joint venture between Ascendas Land Vietnam Pte Ltd and Saigon Bund Capital Partners Ltd (JV by Gaw Capital Partners and NP Capital), a 12-hectare business park development, is located at the entrance of Saigon Hi-Tech Park. The campus-style development sets a new benchmark for business parks in Vietnam, comprising a mixed-use commercial building, 07 business park buildings, 02 Work-Office-Home-Office buildings, and a training centre.

Scope of work:
Be in-charge chief accountant, all management financial report to JV Group (Ascendas-Singbridge Group/ CapitaLand Group/ Gaw Capital Group), MC members and other ad hoc projects/reports/affairs assigned.
• In-charge for implementing Phoebus Accounting Software. 
• Review monthly separate FS (PL, BS, TB), monthly and quarterly group reporting package.
• Prepare development cost allocation between properties.
• Prepare budget/forecast template and planning. 
• Conduct regular cash flow management and proactively update cashflow projection whenever needed.
• Review validity of transaction and supporting documents before processing payments in compliance with local regulations.
• Coordinate with auditor and review yearly statutory audited report.
• Review all tax reports submit to Tax government monthly, quarterly, yearly.
• Work with bank official for opening bank account, deposit placement, etc.
• Review and manage debt collection, aging report, supplier payments.
• Project internal control process/review existing, put in place efficiency SOP for payment/ billing/ debt control process, etc.

Key achievements: 
• Leading accounting team successfully with meet all group report deadline/other authorities’ requirement.
• Phoebus new accounting software was implemented successfully. All to-date accounting data is migrated sufficiently and effectively.
• Support on preparing documents for M&A transactions successfully and be flexible to meet all new requirements from new management/ group requirements.

experiences.institution_name: Group of V Lime & Limetta V Lime B Holdings Limited Liability Co & GNP (Under Gaw Capital Partners)
experiences.description:
GNP Capital Asset Management Company Limited under Hong Kong's Gaw Capital Partners which is a uniquely positioned private equity fund management company that focuses on global real estate markets.

Its project companies, the V Lime Group (comprised the parent company and 13 subsidiaries) and Limetta V Lime B Holdings’ principal activities are to operate and leasing of office building and consult management of property.

Be in-charge chief accountant for GNP Capital, V Lime group, Limetta V Lime B Holdings, finance report for Project MMBR – Hyatt Regency Danang on fund level and other ad hoc projects/reports/affairs assigned.
